org.middleheaven.quantity.math.vectorspace
Interface VectorSpace<V,F extends FieldElement<F>>

Type Parameters:
V - the Vector Space element.
F - the underlying field element
All Known Implementing Classes:
DenseVectorSpace
public interface VectorSpace<V,F extends FieldElement<F>>

A finite vector space of elements V over a field F with a given dimension.
